publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-212 Donald Gorrie: West of Scotland Racial Equality Council—That the Parliament congratulates the West of Scotland Race Equality Council on the successful launch of its anti-racism pack for school managers working with children and young people and recognises the positive contribution the council has made to addressing race issues in Scotland, its willingness to work in partnership with other agencies in tackling the problems of racism in Scotland and the valuable contribution made to the development of the council by its Director, Maggie Chetty, who is retiring after 18 years’ commitment to the organisation. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-212 West of Scotland Racial Equality Council (lodged on 27 June 2003) Michael McMahon*, Bill Butler*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-212 West of Scotland Racial Equality Council (lodged on 27 June 2003) Frances Curran*
S2M-212 West of Scotland Racial Equality Council (lodged on 27 June 2003) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-212 West of Scotland Racial Equality Council (lodged on 27 June 2003) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-212 West of Scotland Racial Equality Council (lodged on 27 June 2003) Elaine Smith*
